review: Great product I'm amazed at how much content you can actually stream I even found some old classics...

review: It is everything I thought it would be
author: The Don "The Don"

review: The stick was easy to setup.  Enjoying the new access to movies.
author: Joyce Jeter

review: Expands the capability of my crappy barracks TV.
author: klrman

review: Works really good once you figure it out. Lots of features . Well worth the money. Best streaming device I own.
author: Russell Conner

review: I enjoy my increased variety of shows.  The installation was easy and only took a few minutes.  Well worth the price if you don't have a smart TV.\
author: Krazy Cat Lady

review: The device sounds like a great idea but the wireless antenna is terrible. It will even show your wireless connection strength as being solid, 4/5 bars but still drop the connection. In all, my family has 8 other networked devices, including laptops, tablets, and another set-top device. NONE have network issues in the same room. I do not recommend buying unless your wireless router is in the exact same room.
author: Clarey K Stone

review: Insanely slow. Returned it after two days. Chromecast is so much better.
author: Chris A.
